name: Shikakui Atama o Maruku Suru Wii
overview: Challenge difficult and good questions with the whole family. You can enjoy the whole family in a battle quiz format. Carefully selected Japanese, math, science, social, and Chinese characters, calculations, and graphic questions from 10 successive titles, and the number of recorded questions is 24,000, including new works. You can use the Nintendo DS series main unit as a controller using wireless communication. If you use the Nintendo DS series main unit, you can write and answer Chinese character problems and answer calculation problems by entering numbers, so the range of fun will expand. You can enjoy it with your family as if you were attending a quiz show on TV.
